Package com.xdays.game.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollectionState
    CollectionState.java - Creates and renders a collection page for the player to add a remove card to their deck
    GameStateManager
    GameStateManager.java - This class manages what is being displayed on the screen.
    LoadingState
    LoadingState.java - The first state to load, waits for AssetManager to load assets then moves on
    MapState
    MapState.java - a map state main menu.
    MenuState
    MenuState.java - The main screen that starts, Three buttons Play Quit
    PauseState
    PauseState.java - A screen allowing you to save, load and quit the game
    PlayState
    PlayState.java - this class is used to render and handle input for the the state where the card game is being played.
    State
    State.java - a abstract class which extends all other state classes
    TutorialState
    TutorialState.java - A tutorial for XDAYSLEFT
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StateEnum
    StateEunm.java - A enum of the different states
